greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for a(Fermi-Dirac primes) = constant sequences.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, if A302777(n) is 1 [when n is in A050376], a(n) = 2, otherwise a(n) = 1 + n - A302778(n) = running count from 3 onward.
program: partialsums(f,up_to) = { my(v = vector(up_to), s=0); for(i=1,up_to,s += f(i); v[i] = s); (v); }
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 02 2018
